replies.author: snowclay
replies.txt_content: svs牌子插件。右键执行指令。执行给玩家权限的指令就行了

replies.author: 西井丶
replies.txt_content:
如果是scriptblocks
那么就是/sbinteract create @bypass /manuaddp <player> essentials.back
用法:/sbinteract create @bypass <指令>
